entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • R2R known test failure #87716
  • System.Speech is missing API documentation #87711
  • System.Numerics.Tensors is missing API documentation #87710
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests is missing API documentation #87709
  • Inconsistent ANSICodePage and OEMCodePage values #87705
    Future
  • Framework Not Detecting On Linux When Executing "dotnet" Command #87704
  • .Net NativeAOT doesn't generate System.Net.Security.Native lib #87701
  • all flags(ars) to optimize for native aot #87698
  • [Analyzer]: Extend string IndexOf => Contains analyzers to Span IndexOf/IndexOfAny/IndexOfAnyExcept #87691
  • [API Proposal]: Span.StartsWith/EndsWith(T) #87689
  • Failed to read environment variable [DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS], HRESULT: 0x800700CB #87687
  • Mac Catalyst/ARM64 crash: * Assertion: should not be reached at /Users/runner/work/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:4109 #87682
  • [Tracking] Expose a `Lock` type #87673
    Future
  • Libraries tests timing out on AlmaLinux #87667
  • Things needing System.Net.Security.Native may not work on Bionic #87665
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_54719/test54719/test54719 #87663

Closed

  • Eliminate the need to preserve struct handles for `SIMD` types #69822
    Future
  • Debugger.IsAttached doesn't work #84736
  • Dataflow analysis taking forever #87596
  • ILLink produces invalid IL metadata with -b switch and Save assembly mode #86462
  • JIT-EE interface clean up (tracking issue) #86672
    Future
  • CurrencyNegativePattern can be 16 #87643
    Future
  • CQ: Big Value Type Suboptimal Inlining Code Generation #39732
    Future
  • Allow cancellation of Process standard IO stream operations on Windows #84290
    8.0.0
  • Can Unsafe.As do-not-enreg[SVB] ld-addr-op be elided on inlining? #10029
    Future
  • Struct getters are generating unneccessary instructions on x64 when struct contains floats #7200
    Future
  • Segfault in CMiniMdTemplate<CMiniMdRW>::getSignatureOfMemberRef #85777
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Investigate adding "phantom" replacements during physical promotion #87371
  • [API Proposal]: Bring back extensions API to ease adoption of extensions libraries from older frameworks #87480
    8.0.0
  • Possible regression in JavaScript [JSImport]/[JSExport] interop in a Blazor app (.NET 8 Preview 5) #87690
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid lowering for SELECT over mixed neg/not operands #87384
    8.0.0
  • Serializing type which hides inherited property with both properties ignored throws ArgumentException #66900
    8.0.0
  • is there any way to that vs 2022 exists using vswhere although i dont install it #86947
  • [hot reload] Support the GenericAddFieldToExistingType capability in Mono #86111
  • [Documentation] Request update on the documentation of IL2026 #85274
  • Random crashes in System.Net.Mail test suites with mono interpreter #87271
  • DependencyContextTests.DefaultWorksCorrectly test fails on native AOT #87694
  • Developers should not encounter property visibility issues when using STJ source generation #79161
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generation should accept init-only properties with JsonIgnoreCondition.Always #66003
    Future
  • HTTPS performance degradation in HttpClient after .NET 7 migration #78686
  • Client Certificate Authentication Time out after 100s On Linux #69167
    Future
  • 7.0 Native AOT linux-arm64 compiler references glibc 2.27 #84183
    7.0.x
  • Remove traceparent header from http requests #87635
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Unnecessary lookup in TrailingEpilogueInstructionsCount #75807
    8.0.0
  • Use MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute to clear Mono's reflection cache #50978
    8.0.0
  • [EnC] Implement the UpdateParameters capability #56626
    8.0.0
  • Make KeyValuePair<,> support in JSON src-gen mode trim-safe #60072
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Microbenchmarks failing with assertion `Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/component/marshal-ilgen-stub.c:28, condition `!m_type_is_byref(t)' not met` #87623
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2203090 #87714
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Avoid doing copy propagation on ldaddr for gsharedvt vari… #87713
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a minor race condition in Monitor's AwareLock regarding tracking of waiter starvation #87703
    area-System.Threading, Future
  • CVE-2023-24936: Check type is allowed when deserializing instance types that implements INullable #87702
    area-System.Data
  • Refactor how diagnostics work in the interop generators #87700
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Adjust the costs for floating-point/simd to better reflect reality #87699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #87697
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fixed System.Tests.DateTimeTests.TryFormat_MatchesToString test #87693
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assertion. #87692
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (3/n) #87688
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [mono][jit] Enabling some Vector4 methods as Intrinsics on arm64. #87684
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix typos in Process.cs #87683
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [PoC] surface Quic transport errors #87679
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Don't create type loader for apps that don't need it #87678
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • CurrencyNegativePattern can be 16 #87671
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Fix crossgen zip missing error #87662
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix TLS access on Bionic #87670
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Hardcode Debugger.IsAttached to false #87677
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not quote rpath passed to linker for Bionic #87669
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Limit number of tracked values in trim dataflow analysis #87634
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix missing assemblyref for typeref only kept for debug info in illink #87575
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix broken link in editing-and-debugging.md #87681
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Clean up JIT flags #87588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address feedback from #87680. #87695
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable async-over-sync FileStream read/writes to be cancelable on Windows #87103
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fully qualify return type on UnreachableException methods #87661
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Add support for induced field accesses in physical promotion #87410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Restore removed API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix invalid lowering for SELECT over mixed neg/not operands #87674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ContainsAny{Except} #87621
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • fix(66900): Adding test for confirm bug fix. #87167
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [hot reload][mono] Implement support for adding static and instance fields to generic classes #87285
    area-EnC-mono
  • Fix `File.Copy` onto a symlink on macOS #87600
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix broken link in CONTRIBUTING.md #87685
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix concurrency issues with publishing transfomed imethod #87555
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Attempt to fix browser-wasm test failures. #87680
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Unblock CI by removing AlmaLinux from libraries tests #87668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix DependencyModel tests on NativeAOT #87666
    area-DependencyModel
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (2/n) #87630
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [mono][llvm] Fixed personality function on Windows #87675
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove KeyValuePairConverter. #87637
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Reimplement NegotiateStream using (mostly) public NegotiateAuthenticaton API #86948
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix redundant MethodInfo lookup in UnixNativeCodeManager #87664
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2202323 #87660
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove dead code #87399
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Build integration support for Bionic in NativeAOT #87595
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to some hosting types #87599
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] Fix inclusion of `marshal-ilgen` component #87629
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Make virtual delegate targets less costly #87308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Inline TLS field access for linux x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Options validation source generator #87587
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check Locations length before accessing #87659
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a couple of issues related to Process.WaitForExit on Unix #87174
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Make sure intellisense files are copied to the ref pack output for the current TargetOS #87603
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add helix retries for debugger tests #87565
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: [mono] Do not ignore non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #87406
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Ensure that the various Min and Max APIs are accelerated where possible #87641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Block "Convert To LibraryImport" in more unsupported cases #87503
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [jiterp] Low threshold jiterpreter CI run #86500
    NO-MERGE
  • [NativeAOT] Faster find unwind info on Unix #87204
    tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Invoke startup hook from ApplyStartupHook diagnostic command #87490
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add support for https proxy #87638
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve dynamic heap count #87619
    area-GC-coreclr
  • add zero byte read to SslStream #87563
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add new call fast path opcodes #87133
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Convert HttpListener to use public NegotiateAuthentication API #86956
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Logging middleware #87550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [WIP] enable regions for MacOS #87421
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Expose AVX512 Compare and BlendVariable APIs #87404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [SBRP] Generated artifacts have a mixture of line endings #33289
  • Enable dynamic adaptive GC by default in Web SDK when PublishAot==true #33298
  • Dotnet publish command fails after updating to dotnet SDK 7.0.302 #32648
  • High Precision Timer #18602
    Discussion

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • Consider using `PublishAot` for Mobile Platforms and Blazor WASM #25392
    .NET 8.0
  • .NET 8.0.0-preview.5.23280.1 and Entity Framework Core can't read appsettings.js during migration #33259
  • [NETSDKE2E]Error happens "Workload installation failed: Access to the path 'C:\ProgramData\dotnet\workloads\Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task.Msi.x64\8.0.0-preview.6.23307.4\msi.json' is denied." when installing workload using another account. #33198

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33341
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload #33336
    Area-Containers
  • Fix workload cache security descriptors #33322
    untriaged
  • First Run: Update ASP.NET cert message to be OS-specific #33312
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable dynamic adaptive GC by default in Web SDK when PublishAot==true #33309
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Normalize line endings in GenAPI consistently #33348
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust test approval following the change to .gitignore template #33328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet-watch: Enable nullable annotations on project level #32137
    untriaged

Updated

  • Fix R2R map generation on OSX #33225
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2202885 #33303
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Source Link cross-targeting targets #33292
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Update .gitignore to ignore .env files #33305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    Area-Containers
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: Registry: support pulling from quay.io. #33266
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Containers] Enable multi-RID and multi-project containerization #33166
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Prefer spans over interfaces in overload resolution #7276

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection literals: update type inference #7284

Merged

  • Update README.md #7281

Updated

  • Clarify how *ref-safe-to-escape*/*safe-to-escape* are calculated for inline array operations. #7272
  • Add speclet for `ref readonly` parameters #7165
  • Add details to lookup rules for for extensions #7179

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzers should be able to detect that a call is intercepted #68669
    Compiler.Next
  • [API Proposal]: New command line option for reporting IVT info #68666
  • Expected value of GetEnclosingSymbol for PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax #68661
    17.7
  • Incorrect non-local diagnostic classification for VB symbol analyzer #68654

Closed

  • Question to synthesized GeneratedNames for yield statement #68542
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33816.152 #68663
  • [BUG] Order Modifiers fixer does not result in any changes via Code Cleanup #68659
  • Roslyn API broke in upgrade from .NET SDK 7.0.302 to 7.0.304 #68638
    17.7 P3
  • [Feature Suggestion]: Allow attribute location `method` on expression-bodied properties #68653
  • IncrementalStepRunReason incorrect for new or removed attributes #68392
    17.7
  • Escape scope analysis won't work with primary constructors #68610
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ReportIVTs compiler mode #68665
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Primary Constructors: Implement double storage warning for field initializers #68662
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Omit Slice call when start is 0 and 0 <= end <=length. #68660
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Relax value checks for `ref readonly` parameters #68656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect non-local diagnostic classification for VB symbol analyzers #68655
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add ExternalAccess API for interceptors #68652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • fix index out of range in generator driver #68668
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Correct interpolated string addition parts counting #68562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update language server publishing #68504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in MergedNamespaceSymbol.SlowGetChildNames #68614
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Correctly handle trivia in inline statement snippets #68633
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix msbuild for real this time #68651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #68645
    Interactive-EnC, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, 17.7
  • VisualStudioProjectFactory: import the solution service once instead … #68630
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Avoid loading Roslyn through All In One Search when Roslyn isn't loaded yet. #68644
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #68623
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #48861
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts #48860
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mvc #48859
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, plaintext #48858
  • In maui razor development, the NavigationManager.NavigateTo method fails when used continuously. #48856
  • InputNumber validation breaks when hidden and subsequently rerendered #48855
  • Add IOutputCacheBufferWriterStore #48854
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Parameter itself is passed into exception message instead of its name #48853
  • ProtectedBrowserStorage throws CryptographicException occasionally when using PersistKeysToAzureBlobStorage and ProtectKeysWithAzureKeyVault #48848
  • Give error if SSR root component has prerendering explicitly disabled #48847

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes #48826
  • Perf regression: single_query #48840
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #48846
  • HTTP logging + response body logging breaks gRPC. #48824
  • _From @mikaelm12 on Thursday, 03 January 2019 20:00:41_ #48850
  • Blazor SSR: Failed to read environment variable [DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS] #48274
  • Make SupplyParameterFromQuery cascade like SupplyParameterFromForm #48770
    Backlog
  • [SupplyParameterFromForm] attribute and declarative binding #46981
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor dotnet.wasm compression/decompression doesn't round-trip #48674
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #48794
  • Perf improvement: json #48839

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow non-NetFramework tests to be skipped with Mono #48864
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Update NuGet client dependencies #48862
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Added ppc64le architecture to support testcases on power machine. #48638
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting, 8.0-preview6
  • Added JsonWebTokenHandler and TokenHandlers #48857
    area-security
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `334704d` to `18fa6a4` #48851
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Add complex form binding support to RDF #48790
    area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Retain DOM nodes during streaming SSR updates #48258
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Improve GetAuthenticationStateAsync exception message #48812
    area-runtime, area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • [skip-ci] Add missing xml docs for ExceptionHandler #48814
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    feature-output-caching, area-middleware
  • Improve WebApplication debugging #48827
    area-runtime
  • Unhide server option in blazor web template #48838
    area-blazor
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Send CloseMessage from client to server #48577
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove IIS settings from Core API template. #48821
    area-mvc
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • ProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #3985

Updated

  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #3889

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [net7.0-iOS] Cannot debug my project with Linker disabled #15703
  • Bug Report: SQLite DateTime Property Not Loaded Correctly in Framework #15701
  • Disable soft / virtual keyboard automatic popping up on Android devices with physical keyboards #15698
  • [net8.0-Windows] [Regression] CollectionView doesn't automatically expand anymore #15697
  • Android publish: error NETSDK1191: A runtime identifier for the property 'SelfContained' couldn't be inferred #15696
  • Adding a bindable Off state Color for Switch #15695
  • Error on archiving .net7.0 for android with target platform ARM32: "Invalid option 'ARM32' for /platform; must be anycpu, x86, Itanium, arm, arm64" #15691

Closed

  • [Windows] Adding and Removing ContextMenus currently does not work #14984
    .NET 8
  • DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator with System.Net.WebRequest #15456
  • FileNotFoundException when I try to get the version of the assembly #15679
  • Unable to scroll to keyboard #14173
    Backlog
  • [AppStartup] MAUI app Startup is slower than Xamarin #15692
  • HorizontalOptions/VerticalOptions property to Frame not working , Android .NET 7.0 #14188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Markdig from 0.23.0 to 0.31.0 #15702
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures

Merged

  • Workaround WinUI bug with adding/removing flyouts #14985
    area/controls 🎮, control-flyout

Updated

  • [android] improve performance of `Entry.MaxLength` #15614
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Correctly identify headers/footers when using UngroupedItemsSource #15688
    area/collectionview 📃
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [Windows] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15690
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Fix CharacterSpacing on SearchBar on iOS to be actually set #15596
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Manual updates 20230615 Android ecosystem nugets bumped #15685
    area/platform

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SqlLite does not support ToJson()? #31094
  • Is it possible to map with fluent API a value object to separate table in the database? #31093
  • Support primitive collections in the in-memory provider #31092

Closed

  • How to use ChangeTracker.Entries to audit database updates/deletes/inserts #31087

PullRequests

Created

  • Support querying over non-primitive JSON collections #31095

Updated

  • Improve expression debugging #31082
  • Additional cleanup and modernization #31084
